abstract: HSBC has created a new board committee to improve oversight, appointing five independent advisers to work with the group of directors.
snippet: HSBC has created a new board committee to improve oversight, appointing five independent advisers to work with the group of directors.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – HSBC said on Wednesday that it had created a new board committee to improve oversight, appointing five independent advisers to work with the group of directors.

headline.main: HSBC Adds to Oversight Effort With Board Committee
